import React, { createContext, useReducer } from 'react' import Navbar from './components/Navbar' import Home from './components/Home' import Contact from './components/Contact' import Login from './components/Login' import About from './components/About' import Signup from './components/Signup' import ContactForm from './components/Contactform' import Logout from './components/Logout' import { Switch } from 'react-router-dom' import {initialstate , reducer} from '../src/reducer/Usereducer' import {Route,Routes} from 'react-router-dom'; import Buyers from './components/Buyers' export const usercontext = createContext(); const Routingg=()=>{ return ( ) } const App = () => { const [state , dispatch] = useReducer(reducer , initialstate); return (
) } export default App
